item.description:
Hey there, IRB,

I'm a long-time member who's been pretty inactive throughout the past year or so -- but I wanted to let y'all know about this show in case it otherwise slips under your radar!

As a part of this year's Together Festival, NYC's sublime synthpop/coldwave duo BLACK MARBLE will be playing at PA's Lounge in Somerville. Joining them will be locals AVOXBLUE, IMPERSONATOR, and -- yeah, yeah, shameless self-promotion, I know -- my band, RUBY RIDGE.

The four acts on the bill are absolutely going to bring you some solid hours of chilly, synthed-out, sometimes-danceable bliss. This being one of the only Together-related events that's going down in Somerville -- and one of just a handful that's featuring a bunch of Cambervillian artists -- if you're a local, you won't want to miss it!

Facebook event is here:
https://www.facebook.com/events/364442110339454/
Full Together schedule here:
http://togetherboston.com/schedule/

Any other questions, just ask. Hope to see you there!
item.name: Black Marble @ PA's Lounge
